Description: Fragment of a carnelian ear- or hair-ring with angular edges, broken off at both ends, triangular in section. On both sides a circumferential line, at the edge perpendicular small parallel lines.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), E12.1, north section, deep down
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 176)
